description:
The Ultimate Web Design Starter Kit is the perfect tool for entrepreneurs, and non-coders, looking to create a beautiful Wordpress website design with NO HTML experience! - SUPER EASY! IN JUST A FEW HOURS!

As a business owner, you will also acquire all of the necessary skills needed to take your business online including:

  • Great Understanding of Wordpress and Editing Content
  • Tracking Website Data (Google Analytics)
  • How to Acquire a Domain & Hosting for Your Website
  • The "Ultimate Plugin List" - An Archive of Superb FREE Plugins & Tools
  • How to Create Your OWN Business Emails (i.e. john@mycompany.com)
  • Security & Wordpress Website Protection Tips
  • Business Card Designs
  • Google+ Business Listing
  • Basic Search Engine Optimization
  • Develop Your Online Presence from Anywhere in the World with a wi-fi connection
title: Ultimate Web Design Starter Kit for a New Business
